articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 10 - My Love For Tonight Only Cinderella Story in the City
articles.description: While shopping with Ryo, Kaori meets her friend, Eriko who is a fashion designer. Eriko gives Kaori a makeover and set up a date for her with Ryo.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 8 - Revenge of the beautiful woman! The sorrowful blues for Ryo
articles.description: Sonia wants to avenge her father's death and she asks Umibozu to kill Ryo.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 4 - Love is also an A-license. The beautiful wheelman visiting the store!
articles.description: Ryo is chased by the police as they think he is the underwear thief. He escapes with the help of Miyuki.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 2 - The Greatest Flagrant Love Committed: How to Hit on a Beautiful Lawyer
articles.description: Ryo and Kaori attempt to protect a female lawyer marked for death by a corrupt developer, after an electronic databook is accidentally left in her possession.

articles.title: City Hunter: Goodbye My Sweetheart - City Hunter: Goodbye My Sweetheart (Dub)
articles.description: A mysterious soldier known only as Professor takes his revenge on the government that betrayed him - and Tokyo is brought to its knees! Unless the government pays the Professor an impossible ransom, downtown Tokyo will be completely destroyed, and the Profess…

articles.title: City Hunter: Death of the Vicious Criminal Ryo Saeba - City Hunter: Death of the Vicious Criminal Ryo Saeba
articles.description:
Fake news spells real danger for Ryo!
In a story that could have been inspired by today's headlines, City Hunter Ryo Saeba is hired as the bodyguard to Mega City TV’s popular newscaster, Sayaka Asagiri, who’s been targeted for murder by newly-made executive …

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 11 - A Trigger Covered with Scratches! Detective Saeko Loved
articles.description: Saeko meets her ex-lover Asakura who is an agent from Interpol. He asks for her help to apprehend a murder suspect who has escaped to Japan.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 3 - Combination of puzzlement & recovery! Memories are a distant light
articles.description: Ryo comes across a stuntwoman named Yuki who is trying to get her memory back by performing dangerous stunts. She believes Yuki is being hypnotised by someone.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 2 - Farewell, Kaori! Arrest Warrant for the City Hunter
articles.description: Kaori overhears a phone conversation between Ryo and Saeko after which she realises that she has rented her room to a detective whose motive is to arrest Ryo.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 10 - A wedding dress for Christmas (Part 1)
articles.description: Ryo and Kaori receive a strange request from the head of the Yamaoka family looking to retrieve his daughter, Tsubaki from the son of the rival Umino family, Kazuhiko.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 3 - Even Kaori's Pissed: Ryo and a Young Lady, Pinch Hitter Marriage Story
articles.description: While Ryo has his gun taken away from creditors for failing to pay his rent, he is hired by a beautiful woman who is the owner of her own large company to appear on TV with her.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 1 - De-Mokkori Declaration: XYZ Saves The World
articles.description: Ryo and Kaori protect a Rubirian Embassy worker striving not only to salvage the environment of her homeland, but also to expose a smuggling ring in which a Rubirian Embassy Environmental official is involved.

articles.title: City Hunter: Bay City Wars - City Hunter: Bay City Wars (Dub)
articles.description: After the US military ousts a sadistic Central-American tyrant, a spirit of merciless vengeance is born. And when the Bay City Hotel unveils its new supercomputer, the deposed ruler and his loyal daughter devise a plan. With the daughter's hacking skills, the…

articles.title: City Hunter: .357 Magnum - City Hunter: .357 Magnum (Sub)
articles.description: A beautiful pianist comes to Tokyo for a charity concert, and City Hunter is there. But music isn't his forte-Joe wants lessons in the language of love. Typically, though, things don't go his way. A foreign dignitary is assassinated in cold blood; secret agen…

articles.title: City Hunter: Goodbye My Sweetheart - City Hunter: Goodbye My Sweetheart (Sub)
articles.description: A mysterious soldier known only as Professor takes his revenge on the government that betrayed him - and Tokyo is brought to its knees! Unless the government pays the Professor an impossible ransom, downtown Tokyo will be completely destroyed, and the Profess…

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 3 - Even Kaori's Pissed: Ryo and a Young Lady, Pinch Hitter Marriage Story
articles.description: While Ryo has his gun taken away from creditors for failing to pay his rent, he is hired by a beautiful woman who is the owner of her own large company to appear on TV with her.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 5 - Dangerous Detective Game: A Python for the Lady (Part 2)
articles.description: Aiko's uncle is revealed to have staged his accident in order to convince his niece to quit her job as a private investigator.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 5 - Fear! Shinjuku Ghost Story!! The Wandering Soul of a Beautiful Woman
articles.description: Ryo stumbles upon a pretty ghost named Ami Asaka who tells him that she was murdered by a serial killer. She hires him to protect her younger sister.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 13 - Lullaby requiem. The young nobleman who came from a distant country
articles.description: Kaori befriends an Austrian orphan, Hans Zeigfried who is a professional killer and dying from a fatal disease. Kaori is abducted by Hans' enemies.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 12 - Goodbye City, a Farewell Gift (Part 1)
articles.description: On the anniversary of the death of his friend, Robert Harrison, Ryo gets royally drunk and notices a woman watching him.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 8 - Who is Heck is Ryo? Even the College Girl is Smitten with the Thrill
articles.description: Ryo comes across a college girl who is a fan of detective movies, and she tails Ryo for a chance to see some action, not knowing Ryo's lecherous tendencies.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 13 - Goodbye City, a Farewell Gift (Part 2)
articles.description: Sophie Silverman is revealed to be the fiance of Robert Harrison and reveals her intentions of avenging his death.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 10 - My Love For Tonight Only Cinderella Story in the City
articles.description: While shopping with Ryo, Kaori meets her friend, Eriko who is a fashion designer. Eriko gives Kaori a makeover and set up a date for her with Ryo.

articles.description: Ryo receives a strange request from Aiko, a female private investigator, to teach her how to fire a gun.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 9 - The Place Where Gun Smoke Goes. City Hunter Dies at Dawn
articles.description: Ryo and Umibozu fight at a graveyard while Sonia learns about the challenge between her father and Ryo from Miki.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 7 - That Hayato Ijuin's Extremely Peaceful Day
articles.description: Umibozu's saves three young girls from mean bikers and they come to his cafe to thank him. They want to start a fan club for him.
